activities:
Perfect Commerce Holdings, LLC, and its's subsidiaries, offer or use web-based software services hosted in the United States which are accessed internationally. The purpose of these services is to electronically connect buying and supplying organizations and customers to enable
them to exchange business documents for sourcing and procurement transactions and to store related data for
the customer organizations. Valid contact information is required to facilitate the transactions between the
business entities and for the establishment of user accounts. The personal information entered into this system
includes the business contact information of the representatives of companies using the Services. This type of information may be received from occupants of any number of countries including but not limited to those listed below.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Questions, disputes, complaints, and requests are initially handled internally by contacting privacy@perfect.com. If disputes or complaints are not resolved, then the BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Program serves as the dispute resolution process.
